DOC.brief_title: Hipoenergetic Effect Diet Associated Not With Consumption Coconut Flour Women With Overweight
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial two group , one receiving hipoenergetic diet 180 day another group hipoenergetic diet 90 day , washout period another 90 day another period another 90 day diet meal plus hipoenergética coconut . In order ass body mass , waist circumference neck , ass lipid profile , glucose uric acid .
DOC.criteria: woman > 20 year old BMI > 25 Kg/m² Performing diet / make use drug reduction body weight ; Supplements kind ; Pregnant lactate woman ; In use statin ; With voluntary water restriction .
